item.title: SQL.createConnection(); and other SQL errors, Trying to make web highscores
item.dc:creator: @Mattiaspope Mattiaspope
item.description:
@Mattiaspope wrote:

I was trying to make a web highscores and had this error http://i.imgur.com/XQxGw.png.

public void logout() { Highscores.save(this); SQL.createConnection(); SQL.saveHighScore(this); SQL.destroyConnection(); synchronized (this) {
That’s what’s causing the error, The “SQL.” lines but im not sure how to fix this. I’ve tried importing SQL.java, I’m not sure how to fix it

add this to your logout method

Code:

SQL.createConnection(); SQL.saveHighScore(this); SQL.destroyConnection();
Save and compile and you are done adding highscores
Explained: This code tells the highscores when you log out so it will update your stats every time you logout.

That’s what the tut said to do. I did it an got 3 errors and now a 4th error from when i tried to import SQl.java

Any help would be appreciated

Read full topic
item.source: SQL.createConnection(); and other SQL errors, Trying to make web highscores
